front.title: Gang Leader
front.setup: At the start of the game Lung enters play Gang Leader side up. Put Brute into play, Gang Leader side up.
front.gameplay: When the villain trash is shuffled into the villain deck, flip Brute, and flip Lung.
front.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, discard the top card of the villain deck

back.title: Dragon Awoken

gameplay.p: When flipped to this side, destroy all villain cards in play and put all cards in the villain deck into the villain trash.
Reduce damage dealt to Lung by 1.

back.advanced: When flipped to this side, the heroes lose the game

text.p: If there are 10 or more cards in the villain trash, the first time Lung is dealt damage each round, reduce the damage by 1.

At the end of the villain turn play the top card of the villain deck, then:
Lung deals X melee damage to all hero targets, where X = 1 + the number of cards in the villain trash / 5 then,
If there are 5 or more cards in the villain trash, Lung regains 1 HP then,
If there are 15 or more cards in the villain trash, Lung regains 1 HP.
Lung is immune to damage dealt by Environment cards.

At the end of the villain turn:
Lung deals 6 melee and 2 irreducible fire damage to all hero targets then,
Lung regains 3 HP then,
Destroy H-1 hero ongoing or equipment cards.

card.name: Burst of Flame
card.text: Lung deals the hero target with the highest HP X fire damage, where X = 1 + the number of cards in the villain trash / 2

text.p: Lung deals the hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card

quote.text: You don't properly appreciate what superhuman strength means until you see someone leap from the sidewalk to the second floor of a building on the far side of the street.

card.name: Growing Anger
card.text: Discard the top 3 cards of the villain deck. Play the top card of the villain deck

quote.text: You know how this works, right? He only gets stronger the longer you fight him. If you haven't finished him off by now, you're probably not going to.

card.name: Wings
card.text: Lung is immune to damage from Environment cards

quote.text: Spearlike growths stuck out of his shoulders in what I realized were the beginnings of wings.

card.name: White-Hot Flame
card.text: Fire damage dealt by Lung is irreducible

quote.text: Fought for minutes, hours. Fought until four wings extended from his back, and he burned so hot that the steel-like flesh just beneath Leviathan's skin was blackening and charring to ash by proximity alone.

card.name: Pyrokinesis
card.text: Whenever Lung deals melee damage to a target, Lung deals 2 fire damage to that target

quote.text: Lung blasted her with a torrent of roaring flame. For two, three, four seconds, the fire washed over her, consumed her.

text.p: Whenever a hero is dealt fire damage by Lung, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.
At the end of the villain turn, Lung deals the hero target with the highest HP H - 2 fire damage

quote.text: He lit his hand on fire. My mangled arm went up in flames.

card.name: Bakuda
card.text:
At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck.
If it is a One-Shot, Bakuda deals 5 fire damage to all non-villain targets.
If it is an Ongoing, each hero discards 1 card.
If it is a target, the hero with the most cards in play destroys all of them

quote.text: Behind their assembled group, standing astride the Jeep, one foot resting on her modified jeep-mounted mortar launcher, an altered grenade launcher danging from one strap around her shoulders, was Bakuda.

text.p: At the end of the villain turn, Oni Lee deals the hero target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
Whenever Oni Lee would take damage, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is a one-shot prevent the damage. Shuffle the revealed card back into the villain deck

quote.text: He could teleport, but when he did, he left a body behind that could act autonomously for a few seconds.

card.name: ABB Thugs
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, ABB Thugs deal the hero target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage

quote.text: "The 'Azn Bad Boys' is a shit name"
